entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border. Snowfall amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
